examples.full_description: SongsController basic listing, viewing and editing lists all songs
SongsController basic listing, viewing and editing views a single song
SongsController basic listing, viewing and editing fetches a song for editing
SongsController creating a valid song creates a new Song
SongsController creating a valid song assigns and persists new song
SongsController creating a valid song redirects to the created song
SongsController creating an invalid song has not been persisted
SongsController creating an invalid song re-renders the template
SongsController updating a song with valid data updates the song
SongsController updating a song with valid data redirects to the song
SongsController updating a song with invalid data does not persist changes
SongsController updating a song with invalid data re-renders the 'edit' template
SongsController destroying a song destroys the requested song
SongsController destroying a song redirects to the songs list
